faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: How do I get started with Reklam.biz?
faq.a1: Simply sign up for an account, complete your profile, and our team will guide you through the setup process.
faq.a2: We offer geographic, demographic, behavioral, and contextual targeting options to reach your ideal audience.
faq.q3: How does the payment system work?
faq.a3: Publishers receive monthly payments via bank transfer, with a minimum payout threshold of $100.
faq.q4: What ad formats do you support?
faq.a4: We support display ads, video ads, native ads, and rich media formats in various sizes.
faq.q5: Is there a minimum budget requirement?
faq.a5: Our minimum campaign budget is $500, with flexible spending options and budget control.
